index.title: Tutorial: Tour of Heroes
index.intro: The Tour of Heroes tutorial takes us through the steps of creating an Angular application in TypeScript.

toh-pt1.title: The Hero Editor
toh-pt1.intro: We build a simple hero editor

toh-pt2.title: Master/Detail
toh-pt2.intro: We build a master/detail page with a list of heroes

toh-pt3.title: Multiple Components
toh-pt3.intro: We refactor the master/detail view into separate components

toh-pt4.title: Services
toh-pt4.intro: We create a reusable service to manage our hero data calls

toh-pt5.title: Routing
toh-pt5.intro: We add the Angular Component Router and learn to navigate among the views
